channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2024110244
item.description:
Report X-2024110244

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-08T12:22:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-05
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was found in a USPS Dropbox, then given to FedEx courier. 1 cardboard box is labelled "Sodium Hydroxide (Food Grade) (Lye, Caustic Soda) HS Code 281511.00.00. Origin Criterion: A, Blanket Period 26/07/2024 to 26/07/2025." SDS provided by the shipper. Inner contents: 1 plastic bottle @2 lbs. of 100% Sodium Hydroxide (Food Grade) (Lye, Caustic Soda), Belle chemical, LLC, Billings MT. Bellechemical.com, 877-522-2233. NO RELEASE. Shipment is being held for FAA investigation.

item.title: Report E-2024110115
item.description:
Report E-2024110115

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-08T12:22:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-18
  • City: GLENDIVE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.
